review: Works well!  The only drawback is having to plug it into an outlet.
author: Theresa Roell

review: I like having it but sometimes it buffers when someone else is using the fire tv, at the same time
author: Lorraine Kuhns

review: Great we love it, now to watch movies
author: mimi

review: I think the Amazon Fire Stick is wonderful! Easy for a Nana to install! Hope you add more apps in the future. Thank you!
author: Mary Jean

review: I love this product. I wanted the ability to watch shows/movies on an additional tv without needing a cable box. My kids ages 6 & 4 can easily navigate through kids programing and start and stop shows on their own.
author: laura
